Description: Provides full access to AWS services and resources
Provides full access to AWS Organizations
Provides full access to AWS services and resources, but does not allow management of Users and groups
This policy grants permissions to view resources and basic metadata across all AWS services
Provides access to AWS Resources managed or used by Amazon SSM.
The Service Linked Role is used by Amazon API Gateway.
Allows Cloudwatch Application Insights to call AWS services on customer's behalf
Provides access to AWS Resources managed or used by AWS Control Tower
Service linked role for CloudFormation StackSets (Organization Member)
Service-linked role used by AWS Organizations to enable integration of other AWS services with Organizations.
Service-linked role used by AWS SSO to manage AWS resources, including IAM roles, policies and SAML IdP on your behalf.
Enables resource access for AWS to provide billing, administrative and support services
Access for the AWS Trusted Advisor Service to help reduce cost, increase performance, and improve security of your AWS environment.

Role automatically created by ASR for remediation of SNS.2 findings. 
      This role is retained after the solution is deleted to support continuing function 
      of SNS delivery status logging enabled by this remediation. Before removing this 
      role, use IAM access analyzer for confirming it's safe
